description: This file defines a reducer function and initial state for managing notes within a React application's state management setup, likely using useReducer hook.

methods.name: notesReducer(state, action)
methods.description: Handles state transitions based on action types related to notes, including loading, error, adding, updating, removing, and querying notes.

ctags.pattern: /^export const initialState = { items: [], loading: true, error: null, query: '' };$/
